name: Do this first
description:
##### 1. On Runelite, click the wrench (configuration) on the side bar
##### 2. Search for the 'Loot filters' plugin & go to the settings
##### 3. In the 'general' section, change the font mode from 'runelite' to 'plugin' 
##### 4. In the 'Display settings' section, turn on 'Menu: deprioritize hidden items' 
##### 5. In the 'Item Value Rules' section, deselect the checkboxes for insane, high, medium, and low tiers
Optional: enabling 'Highlight notification' for client wide notifications
